fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Palate Cleanser (Night): When using this ability, any other member of the Unseen may choose to not use their ability in return for a heal and a purge of any negative effects.
- Pump Some Iron (Night): When using this ability, any other member of the Unseen may choose to not use their ability in return for gaining roleblock, redirect, and detection immunity tomorrow night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Any Unseen member the sacrifices their night ability for your benefits will visit you the night they sacrifice their ability.
